popt4jlib.PS

Class DblArray1StdVelocityMaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • popt4jlib.PS.DblArray1StdVelocityMaker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NewVelocityMakerIntf

    public class DblArray1StdVelocityMaker
extends java.lang.Object
implements NewVelocityMakerIntf
    the standard implementation of NewVelocityMakerIntf for the case where all objects are double[] objects.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    • Method Detail

      • createNewVelocity

        public java.lang.Object createNewVelocity(java.lang.Object x,
                                 java.lang.Object v,
                                 java.lang.Object p,
                                 java.lang.Object g,
                                 java.util.Hashtable params)
                                   throws OptimizerException
        implements the standard formula for velocity updates of a particle (see wikipedia entry: Particle_swarm_optimization).
        Specified by:
        createNewVelocity in interface NewVelocityMakerIntf
        Parameters:
        x - Object of type double[]
        v - Object of type double[]
        p - Object of type double[]
        g - Object of type double[]
        params - Hashtable may contain the following entries:
      • <"dpso.fp", $value$> optional, the parameter φ_p, default is 2.0.
      • <"dpso.fg", $value$> optional, the parameter φ_g, default is 2.0.
      • <"dpso.w", $value$> optional, the parameter ω, default is 0.6.
      • <"thread.id",$integer_value"> mandatory, the (internal) id of the thread invoking this method; this number is used so as to look-up the right random-number generator associated with the current thread.
        • Returns:
        Object
        Throws:
        OptimizerException - if any of the parameters are null or not of type double[] or not of the same length.
